info.title: CONTENT-AUTOMATION-DOMAIN-ENHANCEMENT
info.description: A FastAPI application for the CONTENT-AUTOMATION-DOMAIN-ENHANCEMENT project.

post.description:
Initiate crawling of a domain.
This endpoint triggers a domain.categorization event which starts the categorization workflow.
The response is only returned after successful event publication.

post.summary: Forces css analysis of a domain
post.description:
Initiate crawling of a domain.
This endpoint triggers a domain.css_analysis event which starts the css analysis workflow.
The response is only returned after successful event publication.

get.description:
Returns the overall health status of the system.
  Provides information about workers, queues, and tasks.

Returns detailed status information for all Celery workers.
  Shows active tasks, processed tasks, uptime, and more.

Returns detailed status information for all Celery queues.
  
  Shows active, reserved, and scheduled tasks for each queue.

post.description: Generate content for a domain and publish to specified platform.

409.description: Content generation is not supported for uncategorized domains

404.description: No domain or content of domain found

post.summary: Generate content for multiple domains in bulk
post.description:
Generate content for multiple domains in bulk (maximum 100 requests per batch).
Rate limited to 3 batches per minute.

400.description: Invalid request - too many requests or validation errors

post.summary: Generate a knowledge base for a domain
post.description: Generate content for a domain and publish to specified platform.

409.description: Uncategorized domain or Knowledge base already exists, or process already running

post.description: Generate content for a domain and publish to specified platform.

404.description: No domain found for the given domain

409.description: FAQ generation is not supported for domains with unsynced content. Please sync content first.

404.description: No domain found for the given domain

post.summary: Generate FAQs for multiple domain contents in bulk
post.description:
Generate FAQs for multiple domain contents in bulk (maximum 20 requests per batch).
Rate limited to 60 requests per minute.

400.description: Invalid request - too many requests or validation errors

post.description:
Publish content to specified platform.

This endpoint initiates a content publishing task that will:
1. Generate any missing media assets
2. Format content for the target platform
3. Publish to the platform API
4. Return the published URL

Args:
    request: Content publish request containing domain_content_id and platform
    background_tasks: FastAPI background tasks
    db: Database session
    
Returns:
    StandardTaskResponse with task information

get.summary: Get task statuses for crawl jobs
get.description:
get a list of crawl jobs associated with a domain crawl worker task, if ther are results available it will return the results with the job task

Args:
    task_id: The ID of the task to check
    job_status: The status of the job to check
    request_id: The request ID of the job to check
    domain: The domain of the job to check
    user_id: The user ID of the job to check
    order: The order of the results (asc or desc)
    limit: The number of results to return
    
Returns:
    Standardized response containing crawl task status information

Get the status of a task. Returns information about the task,
    its current status, and results if available.

get.summary: Get task statuses for categorization jobs
get.description: get a list of categorization task jobs associated with a domain categorization worker, if there are results available it will return the results with the job task

get.summary: Get task status for categorization job
get.description: get a single categorization job associated with a domain Categorization worker task, if there are results available it will return the results with the task job.

post.description:
Terminates a content task


Args: 
    task_id: The ID of the task to terminate
    job_id: The ID of the job to terminate
    domain_content_id: The ID of the domain content to terminate

Returns:
    Standardized response containing task status information
